content: --पद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} one-footed. {2} consisting of or named in one word. (--दं {1} a single step. {2} single or simple word. {3} the time required to pronounce a single word. {4} present time, same time. (--दः {1} a man having one foot. {2} a kind of coitus (रतिबंध). (--दे {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} suddenly, all at once, abruptly; निहंत्यरीनेकपदे य उदात्तः स्वरानिव <ls>Śi. 2. 95</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 48</ls>; <ls>K. 45</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 3.</ls> (--दा a verse consisting of only one Pāda or quarter stanza. (--दी {1} a woman having one foot. {2} a Gāyatrī consisting of one Pāda.
